verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
verses.translation_en: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
verses.translation_zh: 你应当奉你的创造主的名义而宣读，

verses.translation_en: Created man from a clinging substance.
Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
verses.translation_zh: 你应当宣读，你的主是最尊严的，

verses.translation_en: Taught man that which he knew not.
verses.translation_zh: 他曾教人知道自己所不知道的东西。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
verses.translation_zh: 万物必定只归於你的主。

verses.translation_en: Have you seen the one who forbids

verses.translation_zh: 那个禁止我的仆人礼拜的人；

verses.translation_en: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
verses.translation_zh: 你告诉我吧！如果他是遵循正道的，

verses.translation_en: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
verses.translation_zh: 你告诉我吧！如果他是否认真理，背弃真理的，

verses.translation_en: Does he not know that Allah sees?
verses.translation_zh: 难道他还不知道真主是监察的吗？

verses.text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation_en: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然，如果他不停止，我一定要抓住他的额发--

verses.translation_en: Then let him call his associates;
verses.translation_zh: 让他去召集他的会众吧！

verses.translation_en: We will call the angels of Hell.
No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然，你不要顺从他，你应当为真主而叩头，你应当亲近真主。※
